question: Chlorobenzene reacts with bromine gas in the presence of Anhyd <katex>$AlBr_{3}$</katex> to yield p-Bromochlorobenzene.

explanation: The reaction involves the generation of <katex>$Br^{+}$</katex> electrophile.
